title: Your Analytics
noDataDesc: Start practicing questions to build your analytics. Your performance data will be analyzed automatically as you complete practice sessions.

toast.updatedDesc: Your latest performance has been analyzed.

readiness.title: Exam Readiness
readiness.tip: Tip: Focus on your weak skills and error patterns below to improve your readiness score.

weakSkills.title: Skills Needing Focus
weakSkills.subtitle: Your weakest areas based on recent performance
weakSkills.rec1: â€¢ Focus on your top 2-3 weak skills first for maximum impact
weakSkills.rec2: â€¢ Aim for 70%+ mastery before moving to the next skill
weakSkills.rec3: â€¢ Practice in short, focused sessions (15-20 minutes)
weakSkills.rec4: â€¢ Review explanations carefully when you get questions wrong
weakSkills.noWeakAreas: No significant weak areas detected. Keep up the practice!

errorPatterns.title: Common Error Patterns
errorPatterns.subtitle: Mistakes you make most often (last 30 days)
errorPatterns.strat1: â€¢ Focus on your top 1-2 error patterns first
errorPatterns.strat2: â€¢ Track your progress weekly to see improvements
errorPatterns.strat3: â€¢ Reflect on mistakes immediately after practice
errorPatterns.strat4: â€¢ Develop a pre-answer checklist (read, think, check)
errorPatterns.noPatterns: No error patterns detected yet. Keep practicing!

coverage.title: Coverage Map
coverage.subtitle: Topics you've practiced by subject area
